desc: This book is an in-depth guide to writing applications that embrace and extend the new features and capabilities of Windows Internet Explorer 8 and 9. With solid instruction, hands-on examples, and expert insight direct from the source into extending the browser, you’ll learn how to create and maintain powerful applications for Microsoft’s next-generation Internet platform. Join author
title: Pro Internet Explorer 8 & 9 Development: Developing Powerful Applications for The Next Generation of IE
